description: Tonelib Zoom is an easy-to-use application which allows you to see, change and save all the settings in your Zoom guitar pedal ([see supported devices list](https://tonelib.net/tonelib-zoom-supported-devices/)) through your computer. You can also create complete back-ups of all the tones in your device and go back to them whenever you like. You can even share your patches with others or use a cool patch someone else created. [How to use...](https://tonelib.net/zoom-quick-start/)
summary: Free editor for Zoom effects pedals
author: ToneLib
